articles.author: Tucker  Reals, Haley  Ott
articles.title: Watch Live: Trump, U.K.'s Keir Starmer give news conference after signing tech investment deal - CBS News
articles.description: Trump's visit to Britain moves from royal spectacle to politics on day 2, as he and U.K. leader Keir Starmer announce a major tech investment deal.
articles.content:
U.S. companies will be investing 150 billion pounds, the equivalent of over $200 billion, in the U.K. as part of a landmark package announced this week.
"I promised that my government would deliver … [+1308 chars]

articles.author: Ezza Ijaz
articles.title: iOS 26 Sparks Massive Battery Drain Complaints As Apple Explains Why iPhones Feel Slower And Hotter After The Latest Update - Wccftech
articles.description: iOS 26 users report rapid battery drain, lag, and app freezes. Apple explains why performance dips after major updates.
articles.content: Apple released its latest big software update, iOS 26, on Monday, and while it is packed with some massive capabilities, including call screening and the new Liquid Glass redesign, many users are not… [+2636 chars]
